Hi,

I'm trying to get heritirx started. I just get "Starting heritrix...." 
but it never actually starts, it just keeps printing more dots.

First thing, I don't know how to check that I have the correct java/jre 
etc installed. I'm on fedora and did "yum update jre", this seemed to go 
ok, it said it installed it successfully, but maybe somethign is missing?

Can anyone help?

regards,

- Kev
